Bullet EMP.Description:: Clears all bullets in the Aura
Bullet EMP.Stun Bomb:: Interrupts enemy turrets with a short stun

Stun EMP.Description:: Stuns enemy turrets in the Aura
Stun EMP.Ultimate:: deals moderate damage to invaders in the radius.

Barrier.Description:: Barrier that stops bullets and lasers
Barrier.Ultimate:: Place an extra Barrier on the inside

Laser Storm.Description:: Laser Moons strike at targets in range
Laser Storm.Laser Moon Mk2:: Laser moons shoot two lasers,dealing extra damage

Missile Swarm.Description:: Missile strike on all targets in range
Missile Swarm.Ultimate Description:: Enables Missiles to switch to other locked targets.

Point Defense.Description:: destroys a small amount of bullets around the ship

Chrono Field.Description:: phases your ship out for a limited time in a small radius
Chrono Field.Ultimate Description:: Phases the ship out for half a second when they exit the field

Vorpal Lance.Vorpal wake:: Destroys enemy bullets hit by Vopral Lance

Phalanx.Description:: Focused shield in front of the ship

Ion cannon.Description:: launches a projectile that will stun whatever it hits

Goliath Missile.Goliath Missile:: Fires a missile with a large explosion
Goliath Missile.Ultimate Description:: Extends the range of the blast

Blade Storm.Blade Storm:: Variant of Missile Swarm. deals less damage but requires much less energy to use
Blade Storm.Ultimate Description:: Small buff to stats. Any special effect has yet to be determined.
